review: No ability at present to root it. Small but growing (needs to grow much faster) movie and TV selection. Very small app selection. Everything else is good. If you have Prime and are presently entertained by the selection of prime on demand, go for it.

review: We're absolutely thrilled with our purchase of Fire TV...super user friendly, content automatically loaded to "mirror" our kindle fire hd, the operation of he remote is smooth...our favorite part we played with last night was listening to Amazon Music app (we were already prime members) as our family photo slide show played while we decorated our Christmas tree. How's that for a warm & fuzzy electronic!

review: It works EXACTLY as advertized! Very user friendly, lots of choices in movies and TV, I don't do gaming, but it seems to have a lot of choices there also, I highly recommend it!!!
